channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
Noobiest noob questions!
To: The owner of this forum Do not delete/send this to another part of the forum! I don’t care what the rules say, but this forum’s heading says “QUESTIONS!” on it. This is help for all of the other noobs in this forum, so PLEASE don’t delete this
Please answer these yourself and don’t tell me to go to a site because it doesn’t help!
1: how can you create a public server?
2: can someone please create a real “Runescape” server with everything there was on the original RuneScape? (Including updates)
3:I downloaded Moparscape and put it on another pc. When I start it, it shows for 3 seconds before it closes again! What should I do?
4: If there are any tutorials on how to make your own public server, then show me the website, or post them here yourself.
5:If I want to pick a certain object up in one of the servers, it doesn’t work. Why?
6: Even if I am not on the Internet, while I play on one of the servers, it says “connection lost”… WHAT THE HELL!?

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Haiku01 Haiku01
item.description:
@Haiku01 wrote:

ermm

  1. real runescape has like the bestest coding and it’s like impossible to create unless you can copy the codes from jagex co. (and it’s like no-one are allowed to copy there codes it’s like locked up in over 50 locks and 90 chains were attached to the room with there special codes)

  2. Download the new version to make it fully work

5.Just reply to the administrator of the server for this info on that server

  1. Your connection is too low or it’s because there is a error with the server[br][size=1]Posted on: January 08, 2007, 07:22:54 AM[/size][hr]Well that should solve your problem, only 2 left

And for that someone else reply to him for all those other answers

Note: this will be inappropraite I guess If moparisthebest warns you don’t complain it’s all my fault I told you A few answers and didn’t flame

Read full topic
